projects.title: 150 Dickens Street, Napier, Hawke's Bay
projects.description: GDC completed a Detailed Seismic Assessment (DSA) report and Seismic Strengthening Design to achieve 67% NBS. GDC completed a Geotechnical Investigation and Report for the rear extension, and delivered an Architectural Design Package for both the fit-out of the existing building and the two-storey extension. GDC completed Structural Design for the new block extension, Seismic Strengthening CAD Drawings, Emergency Lighting Design, and an Electrical Capacity Assessment for this project.

projects.title: Rotokauri Walkway, Waikato
projects.jobDescription: GDC completed a topographical survey, GIS investigation and analysis of the proposed track, designed the walkway, conducted geotechnical investigations and completed foundation recommendations, delivered detailed design drawings and documentation for a timber bridge and elevated boardwalks, and completed the application for land use consent and building consent for this project.

projects.title: Buckland Road Playground, Tuakau, Waikato
projects.jobDescription: GDC completed Stage 1 Detailed Design services for this project. This included preparing detailed design drawings with finished and existing ground levels, creating 3D animations with profiles, and providing specifications. GDC also prepared engineering estimates, schedules of quantities, soakage testing and design (including one compulsory and three provisional tests), conducted a profile survey, prepared an erosion and sediment control plan, completed a detailed survey, conducted a geotechnical investigation and report, and lodged a resource consent application.

projects.title: Brightlands Childcare Centre, Hamilton, Waikato
projects.jobDescription: GDC completed Architectural Detailed Drawings and Specifications set, GDC coordinated with other project partners, compiled all necessary documentation, and lodged it for building consent. GDC completed a Contamination Report, Preliminary Site Investigation (PS1), a Simple Traffic Report, a 3 Waters Impact Assessment, 3 Waters and Carpark Design, Structural Design including Foundation Design for the building, a Fire Report, Site Inspection and Construction Monitoring, and a Geotechnical Investigation and Report for this project.
